verses.verse: <S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G2309>wilt<s%>, thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> <S%G2511>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2511>clean<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> put <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%>, and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, I will <S%G2309><s%> ; be thou clean <S%G2511><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou tell <S%G2036><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> go thy way <S%G5217><s%> , shew <S%G1166><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest <S%G2409><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded <S%G4367><s%> , for <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> .

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1525>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>, there <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G1543>centurion<s%>, <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G906>lieth<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3614>home<s%> sick of the <S%G3885>palsy<s%>, <S%G1171>grievously<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%> and heal <S%G2323><s%> him <S%G846><s%> .

The <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4721>roof<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2036>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> shall be <S%G2390>healed<s%>.

<S%G1063%G2532>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1683>me<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> man, <S%G4198>Go<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4198>goeth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G243>another<s%>, <S%G2064>Come<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%>, <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4160>doeth<s%> it.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, he <S%G2296>marvelled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G190>followed<s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , I have <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> , no, not <S%G3761><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , That <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> west <S%G1424><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shall sit down <S%G347><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> , in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be cast out <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> : there <S%G1563><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth <S%G3599><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G1543>centurion<s%>, Go thy way <S%G5217><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thou hast believed <S%G4100><s%> , so be it done <S%G1096><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1565>selfsame<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4074>Peter's<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> wife's <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G906>laid<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> sick of a <S%G4445>fever<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1453>arose<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>When<s%> the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come<s%>, they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were possessed with <S%G1139>devils<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he cast <S%G1544>out<s%> the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> with his <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick<s%>:

<S%G3704>That<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G941>bare<s%> our <S%G3554>sicknesses<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he gave <S%G2753>commandment<s%> to <S%G565>depart<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, I will <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1437%G3699>whithersoever<s%> thou <S%G565>goest<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, The foxes <S%G258><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> holes <S%G5454><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> have nests <S%G2682><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> to lay <S%G2827><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2010>suffer<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2290>bury<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G863><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> .
¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%>, <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>tempest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%> was <S%G2572>covered<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the <S%G2949>waves<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2518>asleep<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him, and <S%G1453>awoke<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>: we <S%G622>perish<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> are ye <S%G2075><s%> fearful <S%G1169><s%> , O ye of little faith <S%G3640><s%> ? <S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G1453>arose<s%>, and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1055>calm<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2296>marvelled<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, What manner of <S%G4217>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>!

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gergesenes<s%>, there <S%G5221>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> possessed with <S%G1139>devils<s%>, <S%G1831>coming<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3419>tombs<s%>, <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5467>fierce<s%>, so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2480>might<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, they cried <S%G2896>out<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> have <S%G2254>we<s%> to do <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>? art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5602>hither<s%> to <S%G928>torment<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a good way <S%G3112>off<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> an <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding<s%>.

<S%G1161>So<s%> the <S%G1142>devils<s%> <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1544>out<s%>, <S%G2010>suffer<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> to go <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Go <S%G5217><s%> . <S%G1161>And<s%> when they were come <S%G1831>out<s%>, they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%> ran <S%G3729>violently<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> a steep <S%G2911>place<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G599>perished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5204>waters<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they that <S%G1006>kept<s%> them <S%G5343>fled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went their <S%G565>ways<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, and <S%G518>told<s%> every <S%G3956>thing<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> what was befallen to the possessed of the <S%G1139>devils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> came <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4877>meet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G3870>besought<s%> him <S%G3704>that<s%> he would <S%G3327>depart<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3725>coasts<s%>.
